definition: a nearby object of the same kind, be located near or adjacent to
details:
noun
- a nearby object of the same kind
= example: a nearby object of the same kind
= synonyms: neighbour
- a person who lives or is located near another
= example: a person who lives or is located near another
= synonyms: neighbour
verb
- be located near or adjacent to
= example: be located near or adjacent to
= synonyms: neighbour
- live or be located as a neighbor
= example: live or be located as a neighbor
= synonyms: neighbour
